articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Study finds how specific T cells in brain slow progression of Alzheimer’s disease - ThePrint
articles.description: Washington [US], September 10 (ANI): Up to 5.8 million Americans currently suffer from Alzheimer’s disease, a neurological ailment marked by a progressive deterioration in cognitive function, including memory loss. Alzheimer’s sufferers’ brains contain protei…
articles.content:
The findings of the study were published in Nature Immunology.
